about_the_game:
Mech combat at a grand scale: From small skirmishes to epic battles with hundreds of active units.



Drop into combat. Either alone, leading your squad, or commanding an army. Combined arms combat pits you against a large array of opposing units, where you can pilot any units under your command. Customize the weapon and equipment loadout for your Mech, Tank, VTOL, and Battle Armour to best suit the mission at hand.



Wade through battle wreaking devastation with a large variety of powerful weapons systems. Take part in the evolving battlefield, with fully destructible debris and unit wreckage.



With incredible diversity and depth, the procedural campaign provides a large amount of replayability as you wage war across the star cluster. Face logistic and tactical decisions throughout the campaign as you vie for control of strategic resources, pivotal star systems, and political objectives. Completed or failed mission objectives will have serious consequences as they impact future missions and campaign operations.

Outside the campaign, play in Hot Drop missions: Generate a one-time procedural mission, or a fully customizable drop scenario.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100/AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K/AMD Ryzen 7 1700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3080
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: The year is 2647. War rages 150 light years from Earth. Pilot Mechs, Tanks, Infantry and Aircraft in combined arms combat on many worlds across the star cluster. Play as a lone wolf, or rise in rank to manage and lead entire battalions into combat throughout a procedural campaign.
